description:
Wyatt is a waiter that I met while dining out one evening. He just had the cutest smile and I couldn't resist slipping him my card with a nice big tip!

When he finally called (it was at least a month later), we were talking and he mentioned that he's into boxing as a hobby. So, I asked him to bring his boxing gloves with him to the shoot.

He's definitely a cutie — tall and lean, with a slightly fuzzy chest and smooth ass. I decided to do something different with his video, so I put him in a little jockstrap, had him put on his boxing gloves, and set him out on a little shadow boxing session. I really liked the way the shadows played across his muscles!
title: Wyatt
